content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am fed up with some local people of bad etiquette in my community since I move to this country.

I am really sorry to hear that. I understand how you feel, I have been in the same situation recently. I think it' s important to be able to properly understand what' s going on. Have you asked any of your friends what' d happen to cause this?
I am a newcomer so I don't have many connections to seek help from.

It seems like you are struggling with how to approach things. I think it' s great that you are reaching out to people who have a common sense of what is going on. How are you feeling about this? Are you aware that there are some bad manners within your community?
